1.Text: Beta's Notes

The Valentine season is just around the corner,
and the capital of Midgar has recently become
tinted in the color of love.

This event, that many say has been popularized by
Mitsugoshi, has taken hold faster than expected
because of it's link with love.

No matter the era, love has always driven people to
do crazy things. And of course, I have also made
chocolate to give to Master Shadow...

A gift, my gift... When, where and how shall I give
it to him...

At the end of the day at Shadow Garden?
No, too normal and no impact at all.

If I'm going to give him chocolate, then maybe
I should do it like this...
Crap, I'm late!

Hey, there's something in my locker... A heart-shaped
box and a letter?

Dear Master Shadow, thank you for always being so
kind to me.

I appreciate what you do every day, and how you put
so much love into everything... My eyes are always
upon you. From your gorgeous silver-haired, blue-
eyed, with-a-mole-under-her-eye, elf.

Gorgeous silver-haired, blue-eyed, with-a-mole-under-
her-eye, elf... That can only be Beta!

What a graceful and dreamy woman, she doesn't say
things directly, instead writing such a beautiful letter...
Beta! For me, there is only you!!!
Oh my, if it went like that...hehehe.

Oh! If it's going to be at school, then there is
another way it could go...
"I have something to tell you. Here, after school..."
I wonder who this is from, and for what?
Master Shadow...it was me. Beta.
What's up, Beta? Do you need someth— Oh! This is...!

Yes, chocolate. Hand-made chocolate for my lord,
Master Shadow...
So beautiful...
Thank you. I was able to make it look this beautiful—
No, Beta, I'm saying you're beautiful.
Ulp...!

Classes over, the school is bathed in the glow of
sunset. There, I confess my love while giving him
chocolate!
Our shadows grow long, and then become one...! Oh...!

Oh my oh my, the fantasy started with chocolate but
ended with a kiss...

B-But, if I'm going to do this I could go further...
and use a way that gets us straight to the final
stage...

Even though today is Valentine's Day, I didn't see
Beta at all.

I was looking forward to getting some chocolate from
her...

At a time like this, all you can do is sleep and
forget about...it? Huh? What's this bulge in
my bed...
Is there someone in my bed?!

Ack! B-Beta, you're naked apart from that ribbon
wrapped around you, and your delicate white skin
is covered in chocolate!

Master Shadow, happy Valentine's Day. I was waiting
for you.
The chocolate gift is...me. Please e-a-t me!

N-No, I don't think that will go as expected...
Also, Master Shadow's bed will get dirty from
the chocolate...

How I give my gift is important, but I also need to
think about what kind of chocolate to give him.

If I were to say who would give the best chocolate
in Shadow Garden...then it has to be Epsilon.

When it comes to "Faithful" Epsilon, there is no
doubt that she will give Master Shadow elaborate
chocolate...

I need to make the ultimate chocolate, one that
surpasses Epsilon. If I don't, I won't be able to
make the biggest impact on Master Shadow!
Meanwhile, at that time—

My main rival on Valentine's Day will probably
be Beta...

When it comes to cooking, I am unbeatable, but Beta's
love for Master Shadow is really something else.

I can't just hand over delicious chocolates, I need
some flair. Bend my knees and lean forward a bit
like this, with a 45 degree tilt to the left.

I have to pull back and bend my arms, emphasize my
chest and give him my chocolate while looking up at
him.

Beta doesn't realize that her weapons are weapons!
She is strong but ignorant and proud!

However, I am neither ignorant nor proud. I make the
maximum use of my weapons...

A pose to compliment my superior chocolate! My pose
alone will make my chocolate the best!

You had better get yourself ready Beta! In the 
moment, artificial will triumph over natural!
Also around that time—

Hmm...the estimates come out to roughly this amount.
But, I want to get them up by single—no, double digits.

Valentine's Day is an ideal selling season. I need to
think about Mitsugoshi's chocolate potential.

In recent years our Valentine's Day events have
become fairly well known, so...

We should liven things up for this year's campaign!
A collaboration with the popular writer Natsume! And!

We can really fire up our Valentine's Day with a
collaboration with popular pianist Shiron!

This will surely increase Shadow Garden's assets!
I need to ask them at once!

Beta, otherwise known as Natsume, and Epsilon,
otherwise known as Shiron! Here I come...!

2.Text:
So I have been selected for Mitsugoshi's Valentine
campaign...

It appears that Gamma really sees my value as a
performer.

(This is where I can get more popular, and get ahead
of Beta.)

(If I can achieve that, then it will be even more
certain that Master Shadow will choose me over
that all-natural girl!)
Sorry I'm late. I was busy with a deadline...
Oh, Beta?

Epsilon? What are you doing here? I'm here for the
meeting about the Valentine campaign...
I've been waiting for you both, Natsume, Shiron.

Hold on a moment, what's the meaning of this?! No one
told me that Beta was coming.
Maybe a communication mix-up? Sorry about that.

(If I had said that in advance I'm sure they wouldn't
have agreed to come. This is another business technique...)

Oh, are you going to break your promise...?
You wouldn't do such a thing, would you?
Ulp, o-of course not.
I can't be seen as untrustworthy...

(I really can't believe she is here, I was totally
unprepared for this.)

(Wait, I can think of this as a chance to beat her
directly! I am absolutely not going to lose!)
Good. You two seem ready. Let's get started...

Where did that measuring tape come from? Are you
going to measure something?

Yes, I want to make life-size chocolate statues of
the two of you for the campaign...

(Ugh! Measurements? That would be be bad! They'll
discover my "adjustments"...)

The measurements will take just a moment.
Please stay still.

I guess I have no choice... I'll cooperate, but please
make it quick.
Yes yes... Hmm, have your breasts got a bit bigger?
Probably...my clothes have gotten tighter.
(Grrrr! So envious!!!)
Okay, all done. Next, Shiron.
N-Not necessary.
Oh, but...

I can remember all of my measurements. I wrote down
all the numbers you need here.

(If I'm not touched right, and my pride collapses...
I absolutely can't let such a tragedy happen!)
But, you might have grown...

I measure myself every day. Here you go, these
are today's numbers.

E-Every day? Well...it's great that you've saved me
some time.
(Whew, I escaped that pinch somehow...)

Now that I have your measurements, let's begin our
meeting about the event.

As this will be a collaboration between Mitsugoshi
and two creatives, I would like you both to produce
something.

Produce... In my case, you mean like a
theme song?
You catch on quickly. Yes, exactly that.

As you are a songwriter, Shiron, I would like a
special song for our event.

And Natsume, as our resident writer, I would like you
to write an advertising slogan for this event.
Huh? An advertising slogan?!

(What should I do? I write novels—I've never thought
about advertising slogans.)

Yes, just something short and catchy which captures
the essence of the event.

(You got to be kidding me?! You think it's that
simple?!)

(It takes far more time and effort to write something
short and catchy than my usual long and elaborate
sentences...!)
That's a bit...
A special song for the event... All right, I'll do it.

Can you tell me afterwards what kind of song would be
good? And whether an existing song will do?

You want an image of the event...understood. Thank you
very much, Shiron!

(Urk... If Epsilon can manage this, and I can't,
I will lose status...)
O-Okay. I will think up some advertising slogans.

Thank you for consenting, Natsume. As Director Luna
of Mitsugoshi, I appreciate it.

(Ugh, I felt pressured and said okay. Will it really
be okay?! Can I do it? I mean, I'm...)

3.Text:
"It has transient sweetness, like an enchantment..."
No, too dull!

Urk, I wish I hadn't been swept up in the excitement
and said okay...

(Gamma... No, Director Luna of Mitsugoshi, made a
request of the writer Natsume.)

(Write an advertising slogan that matches the
Mitsugoshi Valentine campaign.)

(It's so much harder than I thought... I'm surrounded
by a mountain of thrown away, crumpled up paper.)
Epsilon is lucky. Writing songs is her usual work.

(Epsilon, as the singer Shiron, was asked at the same
time to arrange a song.)

It is like asking an amazing long-distance marathon
runner to do a 100 meter sprint!

(My sentences usually become elaborate. I want to use
metaphors and adjectives!)

(Ask me to write a long novel with as many words as I
want, then you'll get Natsume the genius writer.)
Short, blunt... Don't waste a single letter...

(This is as difficult as writing that "haiku" that
Master Shadow taught me.)

After all, this is not my field! Ugh, it's impossible.
Impossible, impossible!!!

(Even if I wail like a brat or go sulk in my bed, the
fairies aren't going to come do my work for me.)

(Still though, I don't think this situation will
improve if I sit here glued to my desk...)
(I will slowly stand up, and make a declaration!)

Right, before anything else I should practice making
chocolate for Master Shadow!

(Because I really need to practice, and um...it'll be
good to stretch my legs!)

(Though, I know that actually I am just running from
the reality that I haven't written even one slogan...)
The ingredients I asked Gamma to get should be here...
Ah.
Hey, Epsilon. Wh-What are the chances, right?

Um, yes. I was just going to cook a little
something...
...Like what?
(Is she...out stretching her legs too?)

Well...maybe something sweet, you know, like
chocolate...

(Just to be sure, I was going to review my chocolate-
making process...)

(Beta being here to practice as well... Were we both
thinking the same thing?)
Why are you here?

Well, obviously the only reason why anyone would come
here is to cook or eat.

Wow, you've got so much time that you can cook while
working on slogans?
That goes for you too...!

(Good chance! I can see for myself what chocolate
she is going to make!)
Let's see, cacao, cacao...
Milk, and eggs too...

(Eggs? Chocolate? Gateau chocolate? No... She is
going to use egg white...meringue?)

(Rather than melt cooking chocolate with hot water,
you ordered raw cacao beans?!)
Not bad...! Not bad at all...!
10 minutes later.

(She finely chopped the cooking chocolate, and made
it more fine by indirectly melting it with hot water...)

Room temperature 17.56 degrees, humidity 23% 50.23
degrees... That's it, there. Okay.

(Epsilon's "tempering" involves centipoise unit
adjustments using a thermometer created by Eta.)

(She is controlling the room temperature and
humidity, even her own body temperature...
This is why she is "Precision" Epsilon...)

(I see how you're moving your hands. I'll use that
as a reference, thanks!)
(I can sense the smell of that chocolate from here. It's so good...)

(And their color...maybe I need to casually check
inside that box.)

(Whoa! A premium brand cacao from the secret island
of Chocoray in the Southern Kingdom!)

(And that dish! It's a replica of silverware used by
an ancient queen!)

(As you would expect of a writer, even her meals have
a story.)

(I can't lose if it's any old dish, but this
opponent has "added value!")

(I see, she does have a point. I'll use that as a
reference.)
Whew... Now to let it cool and harden.
Done.

As you worked so terribly hard, would you mind if I
dip my little finger in for a taste?

...Sure, I was thinking I need someone, anyone,
to taste it. In return, let me put my pinky in
yours...
(It's delicious....amazing technique!)
(Delicious...amazing ingredients!)
Goodness! You've got some talent, Shiron.
You too, Natsume!

4.Text: D-Done! The Mitsugoshi Valentine's Day campaign song!

I have to admit it wasn't easy. I did some chocolate-
making as an act of escapism...

Because I competed with Beta in the kitchen, I was
able to write a great song...
She's my rival in many ways, but I should be grateful.

Beta, your existence pushes me to get stronger and
stronger. But, in the end I, Epsilon, will be the
last one standing!
Wow...!

So, the song I just played is the one I wrote with
the Mitsugoshi event in mind.

Thank you so much! It was just as I imagined...
No, it is a song even better than I imagined!

And this is the score for the campaign song. I made
some adjustments so that even amateurs can play it.

You even thought about the musicians! I really
appreciate all of this.
A melting melody, which is sweet like chocolate...

...and yet it was a superb song that somehow
contained a feeling of sharp sparks.

(She really got it. Gamma's eye for quality...no, her
ear? Is always reliable.)

I was concerned if you would be able to create a song
that matches our advertising slogan, but it is perfect.
The advertising slogan? Beta beat me to it...

The advertising slogan is short. Here, I've put it on
this poster!
"Sweet Fight." I see...

There is a gap between "sweet" and "fight," it
impacts customers quickly, in a good way.

What is that "." at the end I wonder. Could it be a
symbol for chocolate?

When you use a period it marks the end of a sentence.
It marks the conclusion. It has the effect of emphasis.

For example, in music we use a mark called an accent
to indicate a strong emphasis.

Wow. I guess it is to be expected that experts know
about other experts. It is a bit beyond me.

(Beta and I were on equal footing in that chocolate-
making practice...)

(There is no mystery or surprise here. She can achieve
it if she tries.)
(There would be no competition here otherwise!)

Anyway, we will probably need to make some
adjustments to the score...

But, you successfully did your part. Thank you very
much.
...It's not enough.
Huh?

I am saying just a song and slogan aren't enough to
make an impact and draw in customers.

Let's make another event to liven things up
on the day.

We should hold a chocolate-making event, a cooking
battle, between me and Natsume!
What...?! Well...it would be interesting!

But, I wonder if Natsume can fit it into her
schedule...

She'll make time. I mean, even if she doesn't have
time, she'll force open her schedule to participate.
(Isn't that right Beta? Let's settle this!)

Very well then...I will arrange a venue immediately
and make an announcement!
A few days later, in a certain room.

I assume you are all aware of why I have summoned you
here today. This Mistugoshi flier.

"Sweet Fight.", a collaboration with popular creators.
It even has a special song.

There will also be a chocolate-making battle on the
day. Jeez, how much is this all costing them...?

If this continues then Mitsugoshi is going to reap
the benefits this year too.

The question, gentlemen, is how do we sabotage it...
Are there any cracks in their armor that we,
the Akindo League, can exploit?
With all due respect...I have a suggestion.

Mitsugoshi has rushed this campaign. For example,
they're hiring a lot of staff at high salaries to get
everything set up on the day of the event.

They don't have time to look into the background of
the staff they are hiring, so they aren't checking
people properly...

I see. So you mean we can send troops in to make it
look like they've made mistakes.

Yes, that's it exactly. We plan it so that there is
an incident, which leaves the impression that it
was caused by Mitsugoshi itself...
Hohoho... How dastardly!

What are you saying. I can't match you even in
your retirement... Hahaha!

Right...anyway, I will leave the details to you.
I'll cover the costs.
Don't underestimate our strength, Mitsugoshi!

5.Text: Valentine's Day, Mitsugoshi Cooking Stadium

Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for coming to
Mitsugoshi today.

I, Luna, Director of Mitsugoshi, declare this event
to be open.

First, allow me to introduce you to the famous
writer! Natsume Kafka!
Hello everyone, good to see you.
Natsume! We're rooting for ya!

And, Natsume's chocolate-making challenger,
the popular singer Shiron!
Everyone, I'm here to give you a great performance.
Shiron! She looks so lovely today!

For your chocolate-making, you may freely use any
ingredients inside the stadium.

Once the cooking time is over, our 3 judges will have
a vote. The one with the most votes wins.

The judges will include myself, and a representative
of the Kingdom of Art, Oriana! She is currently
studying in Midgar. Princess Rose!

I am really looking forward to seeing what kind of
delicious chocolate you two make.

Also, as a representative of our customers, a student
who was blessed with great luck to be chosen. Cid!
Haha, hahaha... I'm so lucky.

(I hate standing out, but Gamma said me being around
really motivates those two...)

Natsume, perhaps it is a good idea to think about
what you will say when you are defeated now,
before we start?

Unfortunately, the word "defeat" isn't in my
dictionary.

Wow, sparks are flying! The writer and musician are
glaring at each other.

(To the outside world this contest looks like a
battle for the most votes...but!)

(It doesn't matter who Gamma or the princess votes
for, whoever gets Master Shadow's vote will be the
real winner!)
(Crap... I'll have to choose one.)

(A real extra would beg a girl to make him home-made
chocolate for Valentine's Day.)

(Or you only get chocolates from your mom, right?
But this? This is...)

(Anyway, being in this position to choose someone is
taboo in my Theory of Extras...)
(I have to figure out how to manage this...)

Now, I will hit the gong to signal that you can start
cooking!

(Thanks to our previous chocolate-making practice,
I know her movements!)
Ahh...!

(Is she planning to make me choose my ingredients
first and then compete with the same ones?!)

(If we compete with the same ingredients, my cooking
skills will win out!)

(If she is thinking about out-competing me in skill,
then she is way too naive!)

What is that?! Natsume chose cacao beans, and then
pulled some kind of powder from her bosom!

She brought in her own ingredients?! Isn't that
against the rules?!

Check the rules! "Please freely use the ingredients
inside the stadium."

This ingredient is in the stadium! So no rules
have been broken!

(Pulling a plot twist from between her...?!
That's why she is a writer!)

(Hehehe, this is "Original Seasoning," a multi-purpose
condiment that I asked Eta to make for me!)

(I need to cover the difference in technique with
wisdom and inspiration! I hope this is delicious in
the end!)

I'll tell you one thing Shiron, cooking is about more
than taste...

Sorry to tell you this, but I learnt that beginner
lesson long ago!

(You can't jump the gap to my technical prowess with
a bit of cheating!)

Oh! Shiron is assembling her chocolate at a
dizzying pace!

(It isn't your taste buds, it is your eyes! You have
to taste it by...sight and by smell. With your
nose!)
A chocolate tower built so high you have to look up!

A perfect tower, she's proud of it's height, but it
is impossible to move!

(Do you see it?! This is a "Precision" technique!
Before the judges can even eat your chocolate...)
(Their stomachs will be full of my tower!)

S-So that was your plan! To physically fill up the
judges!
(Then, could they eat my chocolate first? No, but...)

(I will need to throw the precious Shadow Wisdom that
Master Shadow taught me in the trash. "In a cooking
battle the one batting second has an absolute
advantage!")

(...Yes, sometimes the one who goes first can win!
I will prove it!)

Meanwhile, Natsume has started making a thick bar of
chocolate?!
What is it...? It's like a book...

Yes, I'm making a book! Shiron, your strategy is not
nearly enough!

(It's true that you can taste food with your other
senses... But, there aren't just five senses!)

Natsume has split the book! Now she is writing on the
dark chocolate pages with white chocolate!

(People live by eating information... Satisfaction,
feelings of superiority, possessiveness... Stimulate
them!)

Is she making a real book?! It will be a special
story newly written by a best-selling author!
An edible chocolate book!

There is nothing like it in this world... What a
luxurious chocolate it will become.

Damn... Can I involve music somehow? No... I can't
think of anything like that!

(This is a precisely calculated tower, I can't add
anything to it, or remove anything!)

(There is nothing I can do except trust myself, and
run with it...!)
Stop! Your time is up!
Somehow I managed to finish writing...
I finished too... *huff* Tower...finished...

Great work both of you! Their chocolate creations are
ready! Now for the judging!

6.Text: A chocolate-making battle between Natsume and Shiron!

What a spectacular show! Now to try their finished
creations.
First, Natsume's chocolate book!

It's a waste to eat it after she wrote such an
amazing story!

(You're saying that, but at the same time you are
cutting it into little pieces...)
And the taste... *munch* ...

(Ugh... My nerves are in a twist about the evaluation
since she stopped talking...)
Delicious!
I did it!

The chocolate has a fine texture, and it melts so
smoothly on the tongue!

(Though, this is the technique I saw and stole from
Epsilon. Temperature...)
(Sorry Epsilon, I borrowed your technique.)

I thought it would be heavy, but this dark chocolate
is crispy.

Rather than being plate-shaped, I used a cross-shape
to bind air inside the chocolate.

It would be absolutely terrible if you get full
before you eat Shiron's chocolate.

(Are you pouring salt on my wounds after stealing my
technique? I wonder how far she will push it.)

But, this powder that was sprinkled all over it,
it doesn't match the chocolate taste very well...
I-Is that so...?

(The seasoning Eta made and gave me, her Original
Seasoning... I didn't have time to test it out with
chocolate...)
Now, the chocolate tower made by Shiron.
Yes, I hope you enjoy it.

Well, first of all my eyes are drawn to the many
detailed designs...

She didn't just build a tower, there are detailed
patterns drawn on the pillars...

In the Kingdom of Oriana, this kind of chocolate
would be popular, and would also receive praise.

Wow... Coming from a lady of culture, there isn't any
higher honor...!
Shad... Cid, please have a bite.
Uhh, yeah, I'll try it...

(Double damn, I still can't think up a reason not to
choose either one.)
(I'm almost at my escape card limit, but maybe...)

Um, how do I eat it? If I cut a piece from the bottom
it'll collapse.
Yes, but you can cut from the top...
Well, not even my hand can reach the top...
Craaaap!! I got carried away and made it too high!

Then, let's use the stepladder over there and just
cut the top tier.

Erm, absolutely not, Gamm...Luna, your clumsiness will
cause a catastrophe.
No no, I won't be clumsy. Please trust me.
Ugh... I have a sinking feeling about this...
Here we are! Now I will cut the chocolate—
Aaah!
Eek?!

(Ohhhh, Gamma on the stepladder got a shock and lost
her balance!)
Are you okay?

(Oh that was close...but somehow my tower was
protected...)
Hey, what are you doing?
We were hired to work backstage! But we've had enough!

Mitsugoshi won't pay us, they just demanded we turn
up today!
We've had it! Mitsugoshi, raise our salaries!
Stop this at once! You are ruining our special event!

Gamma, one question—are they really part-time staff
at Mitsugoshi?

They...might be. This event was suddenly thrown
together, so I omitted a few background checks.

So, is that chocolate grenade you're about to throw
a prop?
No, I wasn't thinking anything of the sort!

So maybe it's some kind of harassment arranged by a
rival company that hired mercenaries...

Would they go that far? However, we've garnered so
much resentment we wouldn't know who did it...

I think in all probability this would have been
backed by a company that sees Mitsugoshi as
an enemy.

Well, regardless of who's behind it, I'm gonna make
use of the chaos and quietly take them out.
Th-Thank you... We can't resort to force so publicly.
Saying that, how do you think I became Shadow...
Cid, it's too dangerous here!
(Huh? When did she grab me by the scruff of the neck)

Nah, I'm safe...but I think Natsume and Shiron are in
danger...

Don't panic! This time I will protect you! They will
have to kill me to get to you!
Aaaah! Gaaaaaaah!!!
(A cat burglar has carried away Master Shadow!)

(If Princess Rose and her fighting ability are gone,
there is no one left who can go all out...)

(But do you bastards really think you can interrupt
this duel between me and Beta with your pitiful
interference?!)
Wh-What's up with the song?!
It's her, Shiron! She's playing the piano!
(Epsilon, what are you doi— Oh! Nice!)
Agh!
Ahh...!

(Everyone is focusing on Epsilon! I'll take this
chance to pick off some of the enemy!)

Everyone, this is Shiron's magic song! It has the
power to make even bad people behave!

(Heh, she is throwing the ball to me and directing
everyone's attention to the stage... I'm the human
sacrifice in her improvised plot...)

(She really is a third-rate writer. But, no other
choice here so I'll play along!)

Damn, we were goin' for a surprise attack, but they
are surprise attacking back! Get the others in 'ere!
Get ready for a melee!

(As if we will let you. This improvisation will end
secretly, in the shadows!)

7.Text:
Damnit, I didn't say do that! It's an easy job you
fools, just work up a riot!

Easy jobs always have a catch... If you don't know
that, you really are hopeless!

Time to play the last movement... Time for the
grand finale!

Damnit, she's a decoy! The other finalist is
taking us out separately!
You noticed too late.
Ah! You're that writer...

It's time to put a period on the last sentence of
this drama.

Ugh! Damnit...! If we gotta retreat, I'm takin' you
with me...!
Huh? Me?

Director Luna of Mitsugoshi! If I can take you out of
the picture then it'll be mission complete!
S-Stop that! Let go of me!
Oh, that's...!
Oh, that's...!
What the...?! Oh...!!!
Noooo, my tower!
Wh-Whoa, the tower! Aaagggh!!!

Urk... You didn't need to make our enemies eat my
tower before I got a chance to let Master Shadow eat
it!

That's exactly why I said it's dangerous... It's too
reckless to let them take clumsy Gamma hostage...

I-It couldn't hurt you two to be a little worried
about me...!

I'll listen to your complaints later. Quick, lend me
your ear...
Hmm, I see... Okay, as you wish.

Ladies and gentlemen! Tell me, how was the Chocolate
Hero Show?!

Oooh, so that's what it was? It was like a real
attack...

Everyone, please give a big round of applause to how
Mitsugoshi's chocolate power completely routed the
Evil Granulated Faction!

Don't give me that nonsense about a show! Look at my
clothes! There is chocolate everywhere!

Yes, we pulled off quite the surprise, I am deeply
sorry that we could not give advance warning.

If anyone has clothing or property that got messy,
we will let you exchange them for anything you
want at Mitsugoshi!
Oh? Really? Well if that's the case...

It was really thrilling, but I'm glad no one got
hurt.
Yes, both the performance and action were amazing!

(More than that, I escaped having to choose anyone!
Yeah, I got through it!)
Phew, somehow the Valentine event finished safely...
Now, you lot. Which company hired you?

...I ain't gonna sing. It's all about trust in the
merc world.

Is that so? That isn't what I heard you say earlier.
You thought it was an easy job to cause an uproar
and then run, right?
That's...um.

Well, I am not interested in who it is. You can tell
your employer that.

You tell them, next time come at us as a business and
play fair.

Master Shadow, finally... Please tell us whose
chocolate you choose. Mine or Epsilon's.

No, I can't decide that since I didn't eat Epsilon's
chocolate...

I thought you'd say that, so I'm in the middle of
building a mini chocolate tower in the Shadow
Garden kitchen.

(I thought I had an escape route, but then a
mini-tower fell on it!)

Come on, you two. Shadow had a tough day at the
event as well, let him rest.
Alpha...

Moreover, it is not just the two of you that wants to
give chocolate to Shadow. Going behind the others'
backs is forbidden.
Huh?

All of the Seven Shadows will make chocolate here,
and give it to Shadow.
But that's... But I worked so hard...!
That's completely different to what I had planned...!
Is that clear?
Y-Yes, ma'am.

(Whoa, scary! No one can disobey this side of
Alpha...)
Done! Fruit chocolate!

Didn't you just cut some fruit and stuff a bar of
cooking chocolate between them?

Err... I don't like really sweet chocolate. So that's
why it's more fruit than chocolate!

Could you at least wash the fruit? You don't want to
give Master Shadow a stomachache.
Beta...my....original seasoning...how was it?

The judges didn't care for it... It's a delicious
powder, but it might be too salty.

Sweet and delicious...hmm. Maybe, a chocolate jelly
pack...that can efficiently supply sugar...?

Your ideas place too much emphasis on efficiency and
lack in presentation...

Epsilon, I wonder if you could show me how to make
chocolate?
Ulp, Me? Show Lady Alpha? Too scary...

Everyone recognizes your cooking skill. Here, you
could be everyone's teacher.

Teacher...! Th-Then with your permission! Ahem, the
temperature has to be—

I don't understand why you put it in hot water to
begin with. It would be much faster if you just put
it into a pot— Owwww!!!

Because you will burn the pot! It is so that it
melts smoothly at a low temperature! Gamma!
Don't make your own original recipes!

(Everyone is busy and noisy, but it looks like
they're having a lot of fun.)

(Delta has Zeta helping her, and Gamma has Epsilon as
well as Alpha. I don't think anyone is going to make any
big mistakes.)

(If the chocolate is from everyone, then I don't need
to choose someone. It's a good thing that it seems
like I can get through this in peace.)
(Next year, Master Shadow...)
(The first chocolate you get will be mine...!)
(...Next year will be fine, right?)
